metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher - Powershell
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND script.script_content.value rlike 'cmd.\{0,5\}\(?:/c|/r\).\+powershell.\+\(?:\\$?\\\{?input\\\}?|noexit\).\+"')

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell
